image_prompts.title: Nekomimi Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Anime-style portrait of a humanoid cat girl with short brown hair and feline ears. She wears a plain short-sleeve shirt and a beige utility vest. Curious expression with playful cat-like eyes, light gradient background, clean and polished style.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: extra limbs, extra heads, distorted anatomy, disjointed body parts, surreal shapes, blurry textures, missing features, duplicated elements, glitch effects, malformed faces

image_prompts.title: RyÅ«jin Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Anime portrait of a dragon girl with short silver hair and small horns. She has faint scales on her cheeks and wears a simple black shirt. Calm and mysterious gaze, light neutral background.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: extra limbs, wings, tails, surreal features, blurry textures, ornate armor, fantasy background, glitch effects, malformed faces

image_prompts.title: Kitsunemimi Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Anime-style portrait of a fox-eared girl with orange hair and intelligent amber eyes. She wears a plain tunic with scholarly appearance. Thoughtful expression, fox ears perked attentively, clean background.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: multiple tails, kimono, fantasy effects, ornate style, glitch effects, malformed anatomy
